name: TypeChain
about: dETH is organization focused on improving Ethereum Developer Experience. * TypeChain - generates TypeScript typings for Ethereum smart contacts, * dETH Code - is Visual Studio Code for reading smart contracts, * dETH Tools - a set of small tools useful for smart contract engineers,
question_1: Optimism codebase uses TypeChain. dEth Code (Visual Studio Code for reading smart contracts) supports Optimism network.
question_2: In the past, we received some grants from Ethereum Foundation and Optimism's RPGF#1.
